name: invoice
description: Creates and manages invoices as JSON files on GitHub. Supports sequential numbering, calculated preview via script, and PDF generation via GitHub Actions.
author: netsnek

env.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
env.description: GitHub Personal Access Token with contents:write permissions

invoicePrefix.description: Prefix for invoice numbers (e.g. 'RE' for Rechnung)

taxRate.description: Default tax rate as decimal (e.g. 0.20 for 20%)
